subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Ian Poulter, who had never finished better than ninth at a major, finished second, while the world’s No. 2 player, Phil Mickelson, tied for 19th.
snippet: Ian Poulter, who had never finished better than ninth at a major, finished second, while the world’s No. 2 player, Phil Mickelson, tied for 19th.
